1.0.0.description:
This essential .htaccess rules plugin allow you to improve security and speed of your wordpress blog.

More info:

  • More info on WP Super Secure and Fast htaccess, with info on how to configure it.
  • Check out the other Wordpress plugins by the same author, and read his blog: Andrea.
